Title: Gentle Daily Cleanser with Blue Tea

Product Description (Long): Gentle daily cleanser that removes impurities and oil while brightening and rejuvenating skin. Perfect for all skin types.
Skin/Hair Type: All Skin Types (dry, oily, combination, normal)
